com.ardock.moodapp.moodock.lib.data.persistence.utils

Interface IPersistenceFacadeFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PersistenceFacadeFactory

    public interface IPersistenceFacadeFactory
    IPersistenceFacadeFactory interface to register and access to all the persistence facades.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeFacadeFactory()
      Close the facade factory.
      boolean containsFacade(String name)
      Returns whether this factory contains the specified facade.
      boolean containsUserFacade(String name)
      Returns whether this factory contains the specified facade and it's set as user facade.
      String getDefaultFacadeName()
      Get the default persistence facade name.
      IPersistenceFacade getFacade()
      Get the default persistence facade.
      IPersistenceFacade getFacade(String name)
      Get the facade specified by the name parameter.
      HashMap<String,IPersistenceFacade> getFacades()
      Get the persistence facades map.
      IPersistenceFacade getUserFacade()
      Get the user default facade.
      void registerFacade(String name, IPersistenceFacade facade)
      Register a facade by name.
      void registerUserFacade(String name, IPersistenceFacade facade)
      Register the user facade by name.
      void removeFacade(String name)
      Remove a facade specified by name from the factory.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultFacadeName

        String getDefaultFacadeName()
        Get the default persistence facade name.
        Returns:
        the default persistence facade name.

      • getFacades

        HashMap<String,IPersistenceFacade> getFacades()
        Get the persistence facades map.
        Returns:
        the persistence facades map.

      • getFacade

        IPersistenceFacade getFacade()
        Get the default persistence facade.
        Returns:
        the default persistence facade or null if it's not registered.

      • getFacade

        IPersistenceFacade getFacade(String name)
        Get the facade specified by the name parameter.

        The facade requested need to have been registered previously.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the facade to be retrieved or null if it's not registered.

      • getUserFacade

        IPersistenceFacade getUserFacade()
        Get the user default facade.
        Returns:
        the registered default user facade or null if it's not registered.

      • registerFacade

        void registerFacade(String name,
                    IPersistenceFacade facade)
        Register a facade by name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the facade to be registered.
        facade - the facade instance to be registered.

      • registerUserFacade

        void registerUserFacade(String name,
                        IPersistenceFacade facade)
        Register the user facade by name.

        This is the facade returned by getUserFacade()

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the facade to be registered.
        facade - the facade instance to be registered.

      • removeFacade

        void removeFacade(String name)
        Remove a facade specified by name from the factory.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the facade to be removed.

      • containsFacade

        boolean containsFacade(String name)
        Returns whether this factory contains the specified facade.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the facade to search for.
        Returns:
        true if this factory contains the specified facade, false otherwise.

      • containsUserFacade

        boolean containsUserFacade(String name)
        Returns whether this factory contains the specified facade and it's set as user facade.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the facade to search for.
        Returns:
        true if this factory contains the specified user facade, false otherwise.

      • closeFacadeFactory

        void closeFacadeFactory()
        Close the facade factory.

        Remove all facades from this factory, leaving it empty and freeing resources as possible.
